cards.rules_text:
Flash
When Frisk enters, put a +1/+1 counter on them for each creature that died this turn, then each opponent loses life equal to their power.
cards.notes: Find art and put in file

cards.rules_text: Whenever Lancer crews a Vehicle, until end of turn that Vehicle gains “Whenever this Vehicle deals combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice it. If you do, it deals damage equal to its mana value to any target.”

As Thrash Machine enters, choose up to six ★ ️worth of modes . You may choose the same mode more than once.
★ — Thrash Machine enters with a +1/+1 counter.
★★ — Thrash Machine enters with your choice of a trample, vigilance or haste counter.

Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, choose one that hasn't been chosen this turn. Create a creature token with those characteristics.
• 3/1 red Hero with trample.
• 2/2 blue Hero with vigilance.
• 1/1 green Hero with lifelink.
{3}{G}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each Hero you control.

At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target artifact or enchantment you control become a Spirit creature with base power and toughness equal to Mad Mew Mew's until end of turn. If you do, Mad Mew Mew becomes an artifact and loses all other types until end of turn.
At the beginning of your upkeep, target opponent faces a villainous choice — They draw a card and you create two treasure tokens, or they create a treasure token and you draw two cards.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“DON'T YOU WANNA BE A BIG SHOT?”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever one or more creatures you control attack, create a Food token.
As long you control three or more Foods, Foods you control are also Treasures in addition to their other types and have “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”

As Flowey enters, if you cast it, exile any number of permanents you control until Flowey leaves the battlefield.
Flowey has vigilance if there is a white card exiled with it. The same is true for blue and flying, black and lifelink, red and first strike, and green and trample. 
Flowey gets +1/+1 for each nonland card exiled with it.

Undying [i](When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)[/i]
Sacrifice Undyne: Creatures you control gain indestructible and haste until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“You're gonna have to try a little harder than THAT.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever you cast a spell, if it isn't the first spell you cast this turn and doesn't share a card type with the last spell you cast this turn, put a rating counter on Mettaton, then you may draw a card and discard a card.
[i]Finale — [/i]{X}{U}{R}, Remove X rating counters from Mettaton: Mettaton deals twice X damage to each opponent.

Cleave {3}{R}{R} [i](You may cast this spell for its cleave cost. If you do, remove the words in square brackets.)[/i]
Create four Treasure tokens. [[At the beginning of your next end step, sacrifice all tokens created this way.]]

As long as you control four or more Horrors, The Titan has indestructible.
Whenever you lose life, create that many 0/1 black Horror Spawn creature tokens with “{T}: Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}.”
cards.flavor_text: [i]But, it was not something that can understand mercy.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
If a triggered ability of another creature you control with Partner triggers, that ability triggers an additional time.
Partner [i](You can have two commanders if both have partner.)[/i]

Whenever you gain 3 or more life, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. If that creature had power 2 or less, amass Allies 1. [i](Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. It's also an Ally. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Ally Army creature token first.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]“My loneliness... my fear... for you, my child, I shall put them aside.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever equipped creature attacks, darken X, where X is its power. [i](Put X +1/+1 counters on target artifact or land you control. If it isn't a creature, it becomes a 0/0 creature with haste in addition to its other types.)[/i]
Equip {4}

[i]IceShock — [/i]Whenever Noelle enters or attacks, you may pay {S}. If you do, tap target creature and put a stun counter on it. 
[i]Snowgrave — [/i]If one or more stun counters would be put on a creature an opponent controls that already has two stun or more stun counters on it, instead exile that creature, and put a +1/+1 counter on Noelle.

[i]Cyber-Army — [/i]Nonland permanents you control are artifacts in addition to their other types. The same is true for permanent spells you control and nonland permanent cards you own that aren't on the battlefield.
Whenever a nonartifact creature enters, its controller loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

[i]Tension — [/i]Whenever Susie attacks, add an amount of {R} equal to her power. Until end of combat, you don't lose this mana as steps end.
Whenever a spell you control deals damage during combat, exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn.

[i]Chaos! Chaos! — [/i]The first noncreature spell you cast on each of your turns has cascade. [i](When you cast that spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom in a random order.)[/i]
Whenever you cast a spell from exile, each opponent loses 1 life.

Whenever one or more creatures you control with counters on them deal combat damage to a player, darken 2. [i](Put two +1/+1 counters on target artifact or land you control. If it isn't a creature, it becomes a 0/0 creature with haste in addition to its other types.)[/i]
[i]Pick up the Pen[/i] — Whenever another land creature you control dies, you may return it to the battlefield tapped. Do this only once per turn.

Whenever another nontoken creature you control enters, create a Food token.
[i]Prank — [/i]Whenever you sacrifice a Food, tap target nonland permanent an opponent controls.
cards.flavor_text: [i]His brother hates puns, but he loves them down to his bones.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Whenever a creature you control dies, each opponent loses 3 life unless that player sacrifices a nonland permanent or discards a card. For each opponent that lost life this way, you gain 3 life.

Enchantments you control are Shards in addition to their other types with “{2}, Sacrifice this permanent: Scry 1, then draw a card.”
Whenever an enchantment you control leaves the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

[i]Across Space and Time[/i] — When Doctor W.D. Gaster enters, if it's not a token, each opponent creates a token that's a copy of it, except they lose all abilities and are goaded for the rest of the game. [i](They attack each combat if able and attack a player other than you if able.)[/i]
When another creature named Doctor W.D. Gaster leaves the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Gaster and draw a card.

[i]It's TV Time!! —[/i] Whenever you cast your first artifact spell each turn, create your choice of a Food, Clue or a Junk token. [i]
[/i]Whenever you activate an ability of an artifact, if it's not a mana ability, put a +1/+1 counter on Tenna.
Put all amalgam creature cards from your graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. [i](Non-Human creatures with three or more creature types are amalgams.)[/i]

Whenever Chara enters or attacks, exile the top card of your library. You may play cards exiled with Chara this turn.
Whenever you cast your third spell from exile each turn, up to one target creature gets -0/-99 until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“My best friend's favorite number is nine. It's because there isn't a number that's higher.”
— Asriel[/i]

cards.rules_text:
This spell costs {3} less to cast if it targets a creature you control.
Enchant creature
You control enchanted creature.
Activated abilities of enchanted creature cost {2} less to activate. This effect can't reduce the mana in that cost to less than one mana.

First strike
When Kris enters, you may darken 2. [i](Put two +1/+1 counters on target artifact or land you control. If it isn't a creature, it becomes a 0/0 creature with haste in addition to its other types.)[/i]
Whenever another artifact or land creature you control dies, put +1/+1 counters equal to its power on Kris.

Whenever a land you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield for the second time each turn, create a 6/6 black Nightmare creature token with trample.
[i]Knight's Blade — [/i]At the beginning of your end step, you may darken 2. [i](Put two +1/+1 counters on target artifact or land you control. If it isn't a creature, it becomes a 0/0 creature with haste in addition to its other types.)[/i]

Asgore gets +1/+1 for each soul counter you have. 
Whenever a nontoken Human you control dies, you get a soul counter.
Pay seven soul counters: Destroy all creatures you don't control. Activate only as a sorcery.

Vigilance, defender
[i]Heal Prayer — [/i]Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Noelle Holiday and scry 1.
{W}: Noelle Holiday can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.

When Elnina enters, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal an Elemental card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.
Whenever one or more Elementals you control deal combat damage to an opponent, draw a card.
Partner [i](You can have two commanders if both have partner.)[/i]

Whenever another creature enters, if it entered from exile or was cast from exile, create a Food token.
If another creature would die, it goes to jail instead. [i](Exile it. At the beginning of each player's upkeep, if they have any jailed creatures, they roll 2d6. If the results match, they choose a creature they control to escape jail onto the battlefield.)[/i]

Whenever you gain life for the first time during each of your turns, amass Allies X, where X is the amount of life you gained. [i](Put a X +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also an Ally. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Ally Army creature token first.)[/i]

When Frisk dies, you may return another target Ally creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. 
[i]Determination — [/i]You may cast Frisk from your graveyard by paying {2}{B} in addition to paying its other costs.
Whenever you cast an amalgam creature spell, copy it. [i](Non-Human creatures with three or more creature types are amalgams. A copy of a creature spell becomes a token.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Everyone that had fallen down... has woken up.” 
— Entry 14[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When this creature enters the battlefield, darken X, where X is the number of creatures that entered under your control this turn. [i](Put X +1/+1 counters on target artifact or land you control. If it isn't a creature, it becomes a 0/0 creature with haste in addition to its other types.)[/i]
Shatter {4} [i](You may cast this from the battlefield for its shatter cost.)[/i]

At the beginning of your upkeep, amass Allies 1. [i](Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. It's also an Ally. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Ally Army creature token first.)[/i]

Whenever a creature you control enters, put a love counter on this enchantment and you gain 1 life.
{2}{B}: Transform this enchantment.
cards.rules_text2:
Whenever a creature you control dies, put a love counter on this enchantment.
At the beginning of your upkeep, target opponent loses life equal to the number of love counters on this enchantment.

cards.rules_text:
When Mad Dummy enters, create two Dummy tokens. [i](They're {4} 0/1 colorless Scarecrow artifact creatures.)[/i]
{2}{B}{R}, Sacrifice an artifact: Each opponent loses life equal to that artifact's mana value. Activate only as a sorcery.

[i]Superior Intellect [/i]— Noncreature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, Berdly connives. [i](Draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)[/i]

Trample
[i]Taking Too Long — [/i]Whenever a player casts a noncreature spell, Jackenstein deals 4 damage to them.

Equipped creature has hexproof. [i](It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control)[/i]
At the beginning of your end step, for each Aura and Equipment you control that's attached to a creature, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Reconfigure {W}{B} [i]({W}{B}: Attach to target creature you control; or unattach from a creature. Reconfigure only as a sorcery. While attached, this isn't a creature.)[/i]

At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may darken 6. [i](Put six +1/+1 counters on target artifact or land you control. If it isn't a creature, it becomes a 0/0 creature with haste in addition to its other types.)[/i]

Menace
Artifact creatures you control control crew Vehicles as though their power was 2 greater.
Crew 8 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 8 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]

Haste
Mentor [i](Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)[/i]
Whenever a creature you control mentors a creature, put your choice of a first strike, vigilance, trample, or lifelink counter on that creature.

{U}, Tap four untapped creatures you control named Annoying Dog: You may gain control of target artifact. If you don't, you draw a card and gain 1 life.
A deck may have any number of cards named Annoying Dog.

Haste
Whenever Undyne attacks, create two Equipment artifact tokens named Spear with “Equipped creature gets +2/+0” and Equip {2}. Then you may attach target Equipment you control to Undyne.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“You're standing in the way of everybody's hopes and dreams!”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Ward {2}
[i]Save and Reset — [/i]Each other nontoken creature you control has persist. [i](When it dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)[/i]

When this land enters, you may tap it or an untapped creature you control. If you do, create a colorless artifact token named Egg. [i](It's an artifact with no abilities. It's just an egg.)[/i]
{T}: Add {C}.
Whenever you cast your first artifact or snow spell each turn, create a colorless snow artifact token named Decoration with “{T}: Add {C}. Spend this mana only to cast artifact or snow spells.”
cards.flavor_text: [i]“As you know, YOU are welcome here any time.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever another creature you control dies, you get an experience counter.
{B}{B}: Creatures you control have base power X/X until end of turn, where X is the number of experience counters you have. Activate only as a sorcery.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Every time a number increases, that feeling. That's me. Chara.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
All creatures attack each combat if able.
Non-Human creatures have haste.

Choose two target creatures you control. Put a +1/+1 counter on each of them, then double the number of +1/+1 counters on each of them. They fight. [i](Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“A white pen, known as hope. Miss! I believe… this is what you hold.”
— The Hammer of Justice[/i]

cards.rules_text: Whenever another creature you control with toughness 3 or less enters, create a Young Hero role token attached to it. [i](If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature has “Whenever this creature attacks, if its toughness is 3 or less, put a +1/+1 counter on it.”)[/i]
Tap all creatures your opponents control. Then distribute up to X stun counters among them, where X is the amount of {S} you spent to cast this spell.

When Motormouth Mike enters or is turned face up, if it isn't a token, create two tokens that are copies of it, except they have base power and toughness 1/1.
When Motormouth Mike leaves the battlefield, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Disguise {W}{B} [i](You may cast this card face down for {3} as a 2/2 creature with ward {2}. Turn it face up any time for its disguise cost.)[/i]

Kicker {2}{W} [i](You may pay an additional {2}{W} as you cast this spell.)[/i]
Choose target creature you control. Until end of turn, whenever you or another creature you control would be dealt damage, that damage is dealt to the chosen creature instead. If this spell was kicked, that creature gains indestructible until end of turn.

Until end of turn, creatures you control become Performers and gain “Whenever this creature attacks, exile the top card of your library. You may play it until the end of your next turn.”
Flashback {3}{R} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]

The Fun Gang is also a Cleric, Rogue, and Warrior.
Whenever you attack, if you have a full party, look at the top six cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield under your control tapped and attacking. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. [i](Your party consists of up to one of each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)[/i]
